Current Question Text: Measure for engagement in muscle-strengthening activities
Variable Label: Measure for engagement in muscle-strengthening activities
Notes: Should be nested under Secondary Source (Physical Activity)
Derivation Notes: The binary strengthening variable was derived from SrvMRE_Strengthening_v1r0. Participants who reported engaging in strengthening activities were categorized as 'Yes'. All others [those who reported not engaging in the activity and those who skipped the question] were categorized as 'No'. The difference between the derived variable and SrvMRE_Strengthening_v1r0 is that the only two options for the derived variable are Yes/No, rather than Yes/No/Missing.
